member.name: WICGifLogicalScreenDescriptorProperties
member.summary: Specifies the logical screen descriptor properties for Graphics Interchange Format (GIF) metadata.

member.name: WICGifLogicalScreenDescriptorProperties.WICGifLogicalScreenDescriptorGlobalColorTableFlag
member.summary: [VT_BOOL] Indicates the global color table flag. TRUE if a global color table is present; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: WICGifLogicalScreenDescriptorProperties.WICGifLogicalScreenDescriptorColorResolution
member.summary: [VT_UI1] Indicates the color resolution in bits per pixel.

member.name: WICGifLogicalScreenDescriptorProperties.WICGifLogicalScreenDescriptorSortFlag
member.summary: [VT_BOOL] Indicates the sorted color table flag. TRUE if the table is sorted; otherwise, FALSE.

summary.para: [VT_UI1] Indicates the value used to calculate the number of bytes contained in the global color table.
To calculate the actual size of the color table, raise 2 to the value of the field + 1.

member.name: WICGifLogicalScreenDescriptorProperties.WICGifLogicalScreenDescriptorBackgroundColorIndex
member.summary: [VT_UI1] Indicates the index within the color table to use for the background (pixels not defined in the image).

member.name: WICGifLogicalScreenDescriptorProperties.WICGifLogicalScreenDescriptorPixelAspectRatio
member.summary: [VT_UI1] Indicates the factor used to compute an approximation of the aspect ratio.
